Big Gaboo! Possible cheat. ( Without gameshark)
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Hoaxes, Myths and Pranks!: Big Gaboo! Possible cheat. ( Without gameshark)
By Monkey in the jungle on Monday, February 4, 2002 - 10:21 pm:

I have recently been to a cheat website and it said this cheat:

1: Raise a skipper in the year 1003
2: Give it a star Prune. Skipper will not accept it.
3:Train it this week.
4: Next week rest it.
5: It will request for an item. Say No!
6: It wil die next week. Build a shrine for it.
7: Colt will ask to clean it say NO!
8: It should look something like a gaboo.
9: Go to the lab. There will be a Gaboo there. It starts off with 999 power and 800 skill.

Someone may have tried this cheat. I f oyu have could you please tell me if it works. If you haven't tried but you know how to get a skipper please try or you could tell me how to getit as i have not tried all me dads C.d's.

By Lisa Shock on Monday, February 4, 2002 - 10:23 pm:

Can't be true.

The building a shrine and cleaning it is part of unlocking Ghost....

By Kurasu Soratobu on Tuesday, February 5, 2002 - 06:50 am:
